about_the_game:
SimATC is a simulation game with a professional ATC rule core, which requires players to have a certain basic knowledge of air traffic control and a relatively standard Mandarin accent (Only Chinese voices are currently supported, English version is coming soon).


Through the voice interaction ability of AI captain, the VHF channel call scene simulation is available, so that players can participate in the role of apron/tower controller in the whole scene, and experience the most real apron/tower control process.

Based on the voice interaction function, the latest 4D version upgrades the 2D field surveillance mode to the 3D real scene mode, providing a full-freedom first-person tower view, as well as a God mode airport sand table view.
detailed_description:
【Important】How to speak ATC command standard

This game uses ATC speech recognition (ASR) technology to simulate the real ATC air traffic control scene, requiring players to be able to correctly "speak out" each control command to direct the flight operation, rather than relying on mouse drag-click. Therefore, players should understand the basic command grammar and pronunciation essentials in advance, so as to improve the accuracy of the ASR efficiency and ensure that the AI captain can respond correctly.
Some basic pronunciation essentials will be released in the form of free DLC, and the learning content of the rules will be updated in the in-game "follow-up lessons".

The AI captain will interact with synthetic voice. Current version needs to have basic ATC knowledge, and the tutorial will be released in a later version.
